name: Fury of the Furries
description:
Fury of the Furries is an action-arcade game developed by Kalisto Entertainment and Kalisto. It came out on 01-01-1993. Mindscape Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Fury of the Furries is available on Commodore / Amiga, Classic Macintosh and PC.
It was scored by Frédéric Motte.
